title: Adds changes in protocol version 2.1.
message:
Adds changes in protocol version 2.1.
Init command to request everything needed to initialize the application state.
Support for ping/pong
Removes the unused type property from the socket message.
Fixes exit functionality by terminating any running socket along with it's thread.

title: Updates the versions of the dependecies. Does some minor cleanup to prepare for…
message: Updates the versions of the dependecies. Does some minor cleanup to prepare for a Google Play release.

title: Adds a value check in the settings activity.
message: Adds a value check in the settings activity.

title: Fixes an issue that would prevent a visual update due to the command being…
message: Fixes an issue that would prevent a visual update due to the command being removed from the map. As a result the Now Playing list will properly mark the currently playing track from now on.

title: Cleans the SocketService and reworks the connection cases.
message: Cleans the SocketService and reworks the connection cases.

title: Adds a landscape layout for devices with sw360dp. Fixes an issue that would…
message: Adds a landscape layout for devices with sw360dp. Fixes an issue that would cause a null pointer exception while handling empty values for nodes in the track info.

title: Fixes a number of broken imports.
message: Fixes a number of broken imports.

title: Fixes a bug that would cause string truncation after an apostrophe. Adds work on…
message: Fixes a bug that would cause string truncation after an apostrophe. Adds work on a layout for smartphones with large screens (like galaxy nexus) with sw360dp.

title: Removed obsolete packages/source files that remained after problematic package renaming
message:
Removed obsolete packages/source files that remained after problematic package renaming

Removes a bunch of obsolte packages and sources theat remained after a problematic renaming. (I blame windows).

title: Adds an identifier for the currently playing track on the now playing list. Adds…
message: Adds an identifier for the currently playing track on the now playing list. Adds minor changes on the connection and reconnection of the socket. There is still a matter of concurrency when the client is denied access. Enables the not allowed event. Converts the NotificationService to singleton. Adds a number of null checks to avoid exceptions.

title: Adds a notification by toast message, to inform the user when the plugin denies…
message: Adds a notification by toast message, to inform the user when the plugin denies access to the client.

title: Fixing the content view issue with roboguice (Removing the @ContentView…
message: Fixing the content view issue with roboguice (Removing the @ContentView annotation with setContentView function onStart)

title: Adds changes on the proguard.cfg. (it is still causing exceptions). Fixes an…
message: Adds changes on the proguard.cfg. (it is still causing exceptions). Fixes an issue where the @ContentView annotation would cause null pointer exceptions on a release build. Using the setContentView function instead.

title: Updates the maven build file, and the android manifest.
message: Updates the maven build file, and the android manifest.

message: Adds various minor modifications.

message: Adds minor layout modifications. Adds about view.

title: Removes unused constants. Modifies the SocketService to add autoconnect functionality.
message: Removes unused constants. Modifies the SocketService to add autoconnect functionality.

title: Adds a null check in the command used to request the current position. Moves the…
message: Adds a null check in the command used to request the current position. Moves the lyrics decoding to the main data model. Fixes various issues with the DelayTimer. Fixes an issue that would cause a single line diplay of lyrics in devices running Android 2.x. Fixes an issue with Android 2.x in which the socket would fail to recognise a disconnect. Fixes the vertical aligment of the volume SeekBar thumb. Adds minor layout tweaks.

title: Fixes an issue where lyrics_line would cause an exception in Android 2.x. Adds…
message: Fixes an issue where lyrics_line would cause an exception in Android 2.x. Adds work on the layout for HVGA and QVGA resolutions. Adds the ability to completely reset the connection by long pressing the connection icon. Fixes a random crash happening while trying to update the playback position. Fixes an issue with the DelayTimer that would cause an application crash.

title: Fixes an issue with the volume change usign the hardware keys, and the volume is…
message: Fixes an issue with the volume change usign the hardware keys, and the volume is not a multiple of ten.

title: Adds three distinct connection states on the application. Adds modifications…
message: Adds three distinct connection states on the application. Adds modifications that will prevent the user to send any requests before the handshake is complete.

title: Adds a validation on the port input in the preferences.
message: Adds a validation on the port input in the preferences.

title: Adds automatic caching of lyrics on connect. Adds a notification for uninitialized settings.
message: Adds automatic caching of lyrics on connect. Adds a notification for uninitialized settings.

title: Changes the package name from kelsos.mbremote to com.kelsos.mbrc. Fixes issues…
message: Changes the package name from kelsos.mbremote to com.kelsos.mbrc. Fixes issues with the lyrics. Fixes a problem with the track progress animation that would continue playing after a disconnect.

title: Adds work on the QVGA layout. Adds a new HVGA layout.
message: Adds work on the QVGA layout. Adds a new HVGA layout.

title: Removes unused resource files. Adds version info on the application settings…
message: Removes unused resource files. Adds version info on the application settings activity. Renames the event types. Adds initial work on a QVGA layout for devices with small screen and low density. Moves a few a of the sizes to a dimens file.

title: Fixes an issues with the restoration of lyrics. Fixes an issues with the volume…
message: Fixes an issues with the restoration of lyrics. Fixes an issues with the volume SeekBar and the mute button. Now the Seekbar will properly go to zero when mute is active and it will restore the proper value on unmute. Lyrics layout is the same regardless of the orientation so it is moved to the proper folder. Removes some unused icons and adds a new settings icon. Moves the no cover image to the nodpi folder.

title: Adds new launcher icon.
message: Adds new launcher icon.

message: Adds layout modifications. Does some refactoring on string resources

title: Fixes the layout of the now playing list and the lyrics view. Adds and modifies…
message: Fixes the layout of the now playing list and the lyrics view. Adds and modifies some graphic resources. Updates the minimum sdk to 8. Adds changes related to the xml parsing. Adds changes to the RunningActivityAccessor and the Controller.

title: Remove unused drawable resources. Adds new 9-patch graphics for the volume…
message: Remove unused drawable resources. Adds new 9-patch graphics for the volume SeekBar. Resolved an issue with the resource injection to the model by reseting the image on the view instead of passing it through the mode.

title: Adds more theme files. Fixes selectable background on buttons. Adds an empty…
message: Adds more theme files. Fixes selectable background on buttons. Adds an empty constructor to the manifest (to get rid of the not default constructor message). Adds an extra constructor with only one parametere (event type) to the ProtocolDataHandler. Fixes an issue with the Notification Service. now it has access to the running activity through the RunningActivityAccessor class. Adds fresca font. The RemoteBroadCastReceiver now is created by the injector on the application creation.
